SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID , A.JOB_SE_CODE , B.CODE_NM AS "jobSeNm" , A.APPLCNT_ID , C.USER_NM AS "applcntNm" , A.REQST_DE , A.SANCTNER_ID , D.USER_NM AS "sanctnerNm" , E.ORGNZT_NM AS "sanctnerOrgnztNm" , A.CONFM_AT , A.SANCTN_DT , A.RETURN_RESN FROM COMTN_INFRML_SANCTN A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM075') B ON A.JOB_SE_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO C ON A.APPLCNT_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO D ON A.SANCTNER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO E ON D.ORGNZT_ID = E.ORGNZT_ID WHERE A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #{infrmlSanctnId}
